## isNumber() function

Check if the provided value is a number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNumber(value: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | The value to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the value is a number, `false` otherwise.
